metadata.title: CVE-2020-5504 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In phpMyAdmin 4 before 4.9.4 and 5 before 5.0.1, SQL injection exists inthe user accounts page. A malicious user could inject custom SQL in placeof their own username when creating queries to this page. An attacker musthave a valid MySQL account to access the server.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
